attributes.action: Allow recently registered Labour members to vote in Labour leader elections.
attributes.background: The NEC decided last night that Jeremey Corbyn will be allowed to stand in the upcoming Labour leader elections. However, they have stated that the recent new members of Labour, since January 2016 will not be allowed to cast their vote in the election.

rejection.details: Procedures for the election of a party leader are a matter for the party concerned, not for the Government or Parliament.
